external_references.description: Hawley, S. et al. (2023, February 2). Turla: A Galaxy of Opportunity. Retrieved May 15, 2023.

description: During [C0026](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0026), the threat actors used WinRAR to collect documents on targeted systems. The threat actors appeared to only exfiltrate files created after January 1, 2021.(Citation: Mandiant Suspected Turla Campaign February 2023)
